AT.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
AT.description: „Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara“ kombiniert zwei zeitlose „D&D“-Arcade-Klassiker:„Tower of Doom“ und „Shadow over Mystara“. Kämpfe dich durch ein Fantasy-Universum mit neuen Spielmerkmalen wie HD-Grafiken, 4-Spieler-Koop-Modus (mit laufender Bei- und Austrittsmöglichkeit), einstellbarer Hausregeln, Ranglisten und einer Fundgrube Extras.

AU.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
AU.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara combines two timeless D&D arcade classics -Tower of Doom and Shadow over Mystara- into one definitive package. Battle through a rich fantasy universe with a host of new features, including HD visuals, drop-in/drop-out 4 player online co-op, customizable House Rules, leaderboards, and a trove of extras.

BG.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
BG.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara combines two timeless D&D arcade classics -Tower of Doom and Shadow over Mystara- into one definitive package. Battle through a rich fantasy universe with a host of new features, including HD visuals, drop-in/drop-out 4 player online co-op, customizable House Rules, leaderboards, and a trove of extras.

BE.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
BE.description: Dungeons & Dragons : Chronicles of Mystara réunit deux classiques de la série de jeux d'arcade D&D, Tower of Doom et Shadow over Mystara. Aventurez-vous dans un univers de fantasy, proposant de fonctionnalités inédites, dont des graphismes HD, un mode coopératif libre à 4 joueurs, des règles personnalisables, des classements et de nombreux bonus !

ES.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
ES.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara combina dos juegos clásicos de arcade de D&D, Tower of Doom y Shadow over Mystara, en un pack definitivo. Combate en un universo fantástico y disfruta de numerosas novedades, como los gráficos en HD, el modo cooperativo para 4 jugadores, reglas personalizables, clasificaciones y un sinfín de extras. Aviso: el contenido del juego de Shadow over Mystara solo está disponible en inglés, francés y alemán.

IT.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
IT.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara unisce due classici di D&D, Tower of Doom e Shadow over Mystara, in un unico pacchetto. Combatti in un universo fantasy con nuove caratteristiche, come l'alta definizione, la modalità coop online a 4 giocatori con partecipazione/abbandono veloce, regole di gioco modificabili, classifiche e altri contenuti. I contenuti di gioco di Shadow over Mystara sono presenti unicamente in inglese, francese e tedesco.

NL.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
NL.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara bevat twee tijdloze D&D arcadeklassiekers: Tower of Doom en Shadow over Mystara. Vecht je een weg door een weelderig fantasy-universum met nieuwe mogelijkheden, zoals HD-graphics, 4 spelers die online coöp kunnen spelen, aanpasbare spelregels, scoreborden en talloze andere extra's.

PT.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
PT.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara junta 2 clássicos D&D de arcada (Tower of Doom e Shadow over Mystara) num pack. Combate num universo de fantasia com novas funcionalidades, incluindo aspeto visual em HD, modo de cooperação "drop-in/drop-out" online para 4 jogadores, Regras da Casa personalizáveis, tabelas de líderes, e vários extras.

RU.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
RU.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara объединяет две нестареющие аркады по мотивам D&D:Tower of Doom и Shadow over Mystara - в одном комплекте. Вас ждет волшебный мир, полный опасностей, и множество нововведений, включая HD-графику, drop-in/drop-out кооперативный сетевый режим для 4 игроков, регулируемые правила, списки лидеров и многое другое.
